channel.title: Please help rep++ for person who solves
channel.description:
can someone help me with standard shards revolution i am having an error with the server....
the code i use to run the server is:
@echo off title Client cd bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\java.exe" -"client 10 0 highmem members 32" pause
the error i get is "unrecognised option : -client 10 0 highmem members 10 32"
i have tried so many differant ways... my classpath and path are both set to my java.exe, but it still doesnt work, neither does the compiler... if someone could help me on AIM that would be great, just start convo with tsunadevovo@gmail.com

item.title: Please help rep++ for person who solves
item.dc:creator: @thock321 thock321
item.description:
@thock321 wrote:

you have quotation marks around ur client 10 0 highmem members 32. Are they meant to be there?

Read full topic

item.title: Please help rep++ for person who solves
item.dc:creator: @ChrisTimRsps ChrisTimRsps
item.description:
@ChrisTimRsps wrote:

can someone help me with standard shards revolution i am having an error with the server…

the code i use to run the server is:

@echo off
title Client
cd bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\java.exe” -“client 10 0 highmem members 32”
pause

the error i get is “unrecognised option : -client 10 0 highmem members 10 32”

i have tried so many differant ways… my classpath and path are both set to my java.exe, but it still doesnt work, neither does the compiler… if someone could help me on AIM that would be great, just start convo with tsunadevovo@gmail.com
